person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Wallabies have their sights set on a 13th successive victory to end their European tour with a 100 percent record but also want to turn on the style and provide David Campese with a fitting send-off in his final match in Australian colours .

Let's think step by step.

1. The Wallabies
2. David Campese

The Wallabies is a rugby union team representing Australia. David Campese is a former Australian rugby union player.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Wallabies have their sights set on a 13th successive victory to end their European tour with a 100 percent record but also want to turn on the style and provide David Campese with a fitting send-off in his final match in Australian colours .

Let's think step by step.

1. In their European tour: Europe (as a continent) or specific European countries where the Wallabies are touring.
2. To end their European tour: End point of the European tour.
3. With a 100 percent record: Refers to winning all the matches in the European tour.
4. But also want to turn on the style: No specific location mentioned.
5. And provide David Campese with a fitting send-off: In Australian colours: Australia (as a country).
6. In his final match: No specific location mentioned.

So, the location entities in the paragraph are Europe/specific European countries, End point of the European tour (implicit), and Australia.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Paragraph: The Wallabies want to end their European tour with a 100 percent record in Europe.

Location entities: Europe.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
